aka: Shin Cho Bakumatsu Shonen Seiki Takamaru
this_title: 新・超幕末少年世紀タカマル
trans_title: Shin Cho Bakumatsu Shonen Seiki Takamaru
introduction: In an isolated island near Japan lies the "Chanpon Kingdom (ちゃんぽん王国)", there live a young samurai boy named Takamaru who can grow stonier by holding his breath for 5 mins. His adventure begins when the Minister of Foreign Affairs and his son were invited to the island.
foreign_title: 新・超幕末少年世紀タカマル
